description.zh: 数字营销和电商行业研究机构，提供广告支出预测、用户增长、平台份额等数据
description.en: Digital marketing and e-commerce research firm providing ad spending forecasts, user growth, platform market share data

authority_justification.zh: Axel Springer 旗下，数字广告预测的行业标准，被 WSJ、NYT 等主流媒体引用
authority_justification.en: Owned by Axel Springer, industry standard for digital ad forecasts, cited by WSJ, NYT and major media
